"}}]},{"type":"col","settings":{"class":"","id":"","style":"","width":"12","background":"","hide_on":""},"children":[{"type":"html","settings":{"title":"","content":"

ABOUT US

We are an Arita based ceramics studio with an emphasis on creating objects that are elegant but playful. All of our products are made by hand, allowing for an ever-evolving range of complementary pieces. We endeavor to create contemporary products that have an element of timeless restraint.

The Ceramics Studio is an inspirational and nurturing place to play with clay. Highly recommend attending a workshop.

The company is operated as an independent portfolio company of Denver-based MBH Energy Resources. Our Wrens, Georgia manufacturing facility is the newest ceramic proppant manufacturing plant in the industry and was designed and constructed under the direction of a number of the Golden principals and the current management team.

"}}]}]}]},{"type":"container","settings":{"container_type":"box","class":"space-lg","id":"","style":"","background":"","hide_on":"","attach_to_section_menu":"0","section_menu_icon":"","title":""},"children":[{"type":"html","settings":{"title":"SPECIAL PRODUCTS","content":"

"}}]},{"type":"container","settings":{"container_type":"full","class":"space-lg","id":"","style":"background-color: #ffffff;","background":"","hide_on":"","attach_to_section_menu":"0","section_menu_icon":"","title":""},"children":[{"type":"row","settings":{"class":"flex-grid","id":"","style":"align-items: center;","background":"","hide_on":""},"children":[{"type":"col","settings":{"class":"","id":"","style":"","width":"12","background":"","hide_on":""},"children":[{"type":"html","settings":{"title":"","content":"

POTTERY CLASSES

The Ceramics Studio is a place to learn all aspects of the craft of pottery in a relaxed and friendly environment

We believe that creativity, play and crafts are an essential part of being a healthy happy adult. Immersing yourself and your hands in the clay and producing something you are proud of makes you happy. Most of our pottery classes are suitable for beginners and perfect for nervous learners.

The company is operated as an independent portfolio company of Denver-based MBH Energy Resources. Our Wrens, Georgia manufacturing facility is the newest ceramic proppant manufacturing plant in the industry and was designed and constructed under the direction of a number of the Golden principals and the current management team.
